name: Overrun (Tanplay)
description:
[This game, including all code, sprites, atrocious art, music, sfx, and all else was made by me in two weeks as a small project. It is not meant to be a proper finished polished game at all. Still, there is some fun to be had.]

W A S D      to move.

Mouse       to aim and shoot.

A series of enemies, ranging from trucks carrying TNT, fighter jets carrying bombs, and H E X robots, are hellbent on destroying a magical Beacon... and you. Fight off hordes of enemies while moving tactically so as to disable everything in time. Use powerups to give yourself an edge over the enemies.

 But most importantly...

STAY.  ALIVE.
